text: José Guillermo Abel López Portillo y Pacheco, (; 16 June 1920 – 17 February 2004) was a Mexican lawyer and politician. He was a member of the Institutional Revolutionary Party (PRI). He was the 51st President of Mexico from 1976 to 1982. ==References== Category:Presidents of Mexico Category:1920 births Category:2004 deaths Category:Mexican lawyers Category:Politicians from Mexico City Category:20th-century presidents of Mexico
title: José López Portillo
